title: 11 of 2013 - Professions Supplementary to Medicine (Validation and Indemnity of Council) Act
title_en: 11 of 2013 - Professions Supplementary to Medicine (Validation and Indemnity of Council) Act
short_name: 11 of 2013 - Professions Supplementary to Medicine (Validation and Indemnity of Council) Act

provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. This Act may be cited as the Professions Supplementary to Short title.
Medicine (Validation and Indemnity of Council) Act, 2013.

provisions.title: Section 2
provisions.content:
2.-(1) Notwithstanding paragraphs 1,2 and 8 of the Second Validation
Schedule to the Professions Supplementary to Medicine Act and ~dd   't
                                                              In emm y.
anything to the contrary in any other enactmentÂ­
     (a) the purported continuation in office ofthe members ofthe
         Council for Professions Supplementary to Medicine specified
         in the Schedule to this Act; and                            Schedule.
     (b) all acts done by those members, in the purported exercise of
           the functions conferred upon them,
in good faith and inadvertent as to their continuation in office and acts
not having been in compliance with the provisions ofthe Act, during the
period commencing on the 16th day ofOctober, 2008 and end~ng on
31st day of May, 2011, are hereby declared to have been validly,
properly and lawfully made and done to all intents and purposes and
with effect as ifauthorized pursuant to this Act.
        (2) Every person liable to be legally proceeded against on the
ground that any of the acts referred to in subsection (1) was
unauthorized, unlawfully done, or otherwise illegal or improper, for any
such reason, is hereby freed, acquitted, discharged and indemnified
against the Queen's Most Gracious Majesty, Her Heirs and Successors
as well as against all persons, whatever, from such liability.
